text: The material in IRM section 4.22.10 is obsolete because the study referenced is complete, and is no longer conducting the Employment Tax Study. If needed, prior guidance information can be found in the IRS repository. Go to http://oldirm.web.irs.gov/ for more information..
IRM 4.22.10, dated 10-17-2012 is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
SB/SE Examiners, LB&I Revenue Agents, TE/GE, Group Managers and Territory Managers assigned NRP returns.
Erik S. OgilvieChief, National Research Program
